story.text: Well, it has been a crazy couple weeks. I almost lost my arm to a staph infection. Currently typing with a large splint on my right arm. Two weekends ago was supposed to be a turning point to get things back on track. Now that will be this weekend. I have a busy week ahead. We just bought a house! It is amazing. Things are settling well with Kamila. Got internet installed this morning - guy bent the screen but oh man is fast internet worth every penny. 100 mbps is the cat's meow.
Gotta save my hand - typing has turned into a bit of a chore.
